method.name: get_bake_mask_value
method.description: Returns whether or not the specified layer of the [member bake_mask] is enabled, given a [code]layer_number[/code] between 1 and 20.

method.name: set_bake_mask_value
method.description: Based on [code]value[/code], enables or disables the specified layer in the [member bake_mask], given a [code]layer_number[/code] between 1 and 20.
